Program_Title: Margaret Spellings Waiting for Superman Thank You

Headlines: Margaret Spellings Waiting for Superman Thank You

Text: i'm margaret spellings president of the u_s_ chambers forum for policy
innovation
and former secretary of education
on behalf of the chamber thank you for participating in our nation wide waiting
for superman to her
the chamber had a busy fall
from albany dot austin we visited twelve cities and a few short months bringing
together leaders in business in education to have a meaningful
conversation about the impact of student academic performance on our nation's
dole of global competitiveness
we heard from employers teachers parents and community leaders that they are done
waiting tired of fighting and ready to take action
and two thousand eleven the chamber will expand its outreach to all fifty states
will provide our vast network with the data and tools needed to engage
educators elected officials and the media and supporting affected education
reform
we're also going to undertake a much-needed research effort to better
understand the barriers to reform that many communities face
it's time we all start asking for a return on our investment
school leaders need to be asked the hard questions about how and why things are
done
they need to be challenged but they also need our help
waiting for superman is helping to create teachable moment waking people up
to the fact that reform is a necessity
not a choice
education is one area where we can overcome politics to help our students
and internet our country do better
but we can't do it alone
we need the help of leaders like you
together we can figure out how we can do right by all of our kids and give them
the best education possible
and they won't have to wait for superman
thank you for your commitment to america's children
we look forward to working with you
i
